TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReplySessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Interface IReplySessionChannel Implements IReplyChannel, ISessionChannel(Of IInputSession)
type IReplySessionChannel = interface interface ISessionChannel<IInputSession> interface IReplyChannel interface IChannel interface ICommunicationObject

Docs.summary: 定义将回复通道与会话进行关联的接口

remarks.format:
## Remarks
[!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-interface-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-interface-note.md)]
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> 接口指示 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel> 实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> 语义。
与其 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> 相关联的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> 可通过 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> 属性进行检索。
